text: Irene Mary 'Rene' Lentle (née Cox) (1912–2003) was a female English international table tennis player. ==Table tennis career== She won a bronze medal at the 1948 World Table Tennis Championships in the women's doubles with Audrey Fowler. ==Personal life== She married in 1938. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:English female table tennis players Category:1912 births Category:2003 deaths Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists
title: Irene Lentle
